content: half_double_crochet in each st chain 1 and turn end of r34 fo 3 row of black switch to purple r35 -r37 half_double_crochet in each st chain 1 and turn end of r37 fo 3 row of purple switch to teal r38 - r49 half_double_crochet in each st chain 1 and turn end of r49 fo 12 total row of teal switch to black page 2 r50 -r56 half_double_crochet in each st chain 1 and turn end of r56 fo 7 total row of black switch to light blue r57 -r60 half_double_crochet in each st chain 1 and turn end of r60 fo 4 total row of light blue switch to yellow r61 -r72 half_double_crochet in each st chain 1 and turn end of r72 fo 12 total row of yellow switch to purple r73 -r96 half_double_crochet in each st chain 1 and turn end of r96 fo 24 row of purple switch to teal r97 -r108 half_double_crochet in each st chain 1 and turn end of r108 fo 12 row of teal switch to teal r109 -r117 half_double_crochet in each st chain 1 and turn end of r117 fo 9 row of black switch to light blue r118 -r121 half_double_crochet in each st chain 1 and turn end of r121 fo 4 row of light blue switch to yellow r122 -r134 half_double_crochet in each st chain 1 and turn end of r134 fo 13 row of yellow vertical patch next you will be working on the vertical part of the scarf this will be made separate then attached after its done you will need black and purple 2 row of each color 18 row all together chain 1 doesn t count as a stitch r1 with black chain 26 1 half_double_crochet into 2nd chain from hook and in each st across chain 1 and turn 25 half_double_crochet here and though out till r18 r2 half_double_crochet across fo switch to purple r3-r4 half_double_crochet across end of r4 fo switch to black r5-r6 half_double_crochet across end of r6 fo switch to purple r7-r8 half_double_crochet across end of r8 fo switch to black r9-r10 half_double_crochet across end of r10 fo switch to purple r11-r12 half_double_crochet across end of r12 fo page 3 switch to black r13-r14 half_double_crochet across end of r14 fo switch to purple r15-r16 half_double_crochet across end of r16 fo switch to black r17-r18 half_double_crochet across end of r18 fo leave extra-long tail for sewing onto scarf sew vertical patch onto scarf using long tail on other side of vertical patch attach maroon r1 chain 1 half_double_crochet across in each space 23 times ch1 and turn 23 half_double_crochet r2 -r5 half_double_crochet across fo maroon at the end of r5 main part of scarf is done sew in all ends fringe- optional for fringe cut strips of maroon around 12 inches long cut about 52 strips add more or less if you like put 2 strips in each half_double_crochet st in the end of both maroon ends trim as needed another way
